reuters.title:
PHILLIPS

RAISES CRUDE OIL PRICES
reuters.body: Phillips Petroleum Corp said it raised the contract price it will pay for all grades of crude oil by 50 cts a barrel, effective Oct 16. The increase brings the company's postings for the West Texas Intermediate and West Texas Sour grades to 19.00 dlrs a barrel. Phillips last changed it crude oil postings on Sept 9. Reuter 
